ComicInfo.Title: Goldilocks
ComicInfo.Summary:
Goldilocks
The circus has come to town and the main attraction is the beautiful lion tamer, the animal trainer with the golden hair. Goldilocks returns to the Grimm Universe! When Skye investigates some mysterious happenings at the circus, she finds herself face to face with Goldie and her three vicious bears.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Keith Garvey | 3 | D | Cover D | Allan Otero & Vinicius Andrade | 4 | E | Collector's Pack Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | Veterans Day Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
